name: mi led desk lamp 1s MJTD01SYL
description:
Product Features:
• 4 lighting modes
• Voice control using Alexa, Google Assistant and Siri
• Built-in dial knob for adjusting light colour temperature and brightness (Press, Turn, Press and turn, Double press)

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 445 x 445 x 150mm
• Brightness range: 1%-100%
• Colour Range: 2600K - 5000K
• Luminous Flux: 520 lm
• Colour Rendering Index: Ra 90
• Lamp Input 12V 0.8A
• Service Life: Approximately 25,000 hours
• Wireless Connectivity: Wi-Fi IEEE 802.11 b/g/n 2.4 GHz
• Requirements for Equipment: Android 4.4 / iOS 9.0 and above

Package Contents:
• Mi LED Desk Lamp x1
• Adapter x1
• Instruction Manual x1
